text:
e="preserve">DHX Media is a Canadian animation studio and production company. They are based in Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada.
Information.
DHX Media produces children's television programming. The company is best known for producing Johnny Test. It has acquired many companies such as Decode Entertainment, Nerd Corps Entertainment, DIC Entertainment, Cookie Jar Company and others.
Products.
"Note: Some products might now belong to DHX Media but were not produced by DHX Media.
